heading: This Afternoon
text: Some snow late, from the Hudson Valley and Rt. 9 southward.
temperature: Upper 20s to lower 40s, north to south

heading: Tonight
text: Snow likely far south. Partly cloudy north.
temperature: Mainly 5 to 15 above, from north to south

heading: Thursday
text: Partly sunny south, mostly sunny north.

heading: Friday
text: A rising chance of snow after noon.
